text: Lieutenant General Choummaly Sayasone (Lao: ຈູມມະລີ ໄຊຍະສອນ; born 6 March 1936) is a Laotian politician. He was the General Secretary (leader) of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP). He was the President of Laos from 2006 to 2016."Ruling communists in Laos promote VP as country's new leader" , Associated Press, 22 January 2016. He was the third Vice President of Laos from 2001 to 2006. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Laos Category:Vice presidents of Laos
title: Choummaly Sayasone
